'Precision-recall'
'Evaluates the ratio of correct laels against the ratio of found lael instances of'
'the data'
'ROC Curves'
'Evaluates the ratio of correct laels against the ratio of false-positive laels.'
'Handle imalanced data'
'As part of its goal of simplifying the machine learning workflow, automated ML has'
'uilt in capailities to help deal with imalanced data such as,'
'\xc2\x7 A weight column: automated ML supports a column of weights as input, causing'
'rows in the data to e weighted up or down, which can e used to make a class'
'more or less "important".'
